statement.p: Several things changed between the development of Python 2.7 and Python 3, and while many of them are minor changes some of those minor changes made parts of Sage not work correctly with Python 3; hence Sage uses Python 2. CoCalc can use both! You can use mode commands to change into a pure Python work space.
Investigate the difference between Python 2 and Python 3 by executing the command print "hello world!" in a worksheet cell formatted to %python and a cell formatted to %python3.
